sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_my_portal_tabs ( id char(32) not null, tabtext varchar2(32 char) not null, userid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, tabmark number(4) not null, views number(11) not null, description varchar2(256 char), primary key(id), unique(userid, tabtext) );
